AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country of claimed citizenship and where laws were violated, also country of illegal re-entry
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country of origin and citizenship of Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa, also country of previous deportations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brownsville, Texas: location from which Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa was previously removed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: location of illegal entry into the United States near the Rio Grande, location of family residence, and location of the division of the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Judge: title of the judge presiding over the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Magistrate Judge: title of the magistrate judge involved in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa testified and entered a plea of guilty, and where his case was heard, with discretion to impose sentences that may be affected by fast track programs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Guidelines: guidelines referenced in the context of Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's case for determining sentence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Amendment 740 of the United States Sente: amendment related to cultural assimilation, effective prior to Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Amendment 742 of the United States Sente: amendment eliminating recency points, effective November 1, 2010
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Fifth Circuit: court that has held that a court may consider a defendant's cultural assimilation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.southwestern border of the United States: region where the 'fast track' program was initially established to accommodate large number of immigration cases
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande: body of water near location of illegal entry into the United States, also location of illegal crossing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas: place where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's father intermittently resided during his childhood
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio, Texas: location where defense counsel assisted Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa with his application for derivative citizenship
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's father intermittently resided during his childhood
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Southern District of Texas: jurisdictional region of the United States District Court, where the Laredo Division is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the record: document or collection of documents containing information about Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's case, including his plea and appeal waiver
